subtitle: from ego to heart part one four stages
and the transformation of consciousness

we sum up again for the sake of clarity
one being unsatisfied by what ego based

for something else the beginning of the
end to becoming aware of your ties to

end for the awakening of a heart based
conscious within you motivated by love
and freedom helping others make the

fulfill anymore the transition from ego
based consciousness to heart based
